channel.title: The Bible...? The Illuminati...?
channel.description:
Hmmm, I was bored today and something in my head told me to read the bible, I was looking at the revelation chapter, and I found some interesting things. What do you guys think about them?
NOTE: I'm a Christian, the Roman Catholic Church leads you more away from god more than you think.
"And I saw a beast rising out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads; and on its horns were ten diadems, and on its heads were blasphemous names. And the beast that I saw was like a leopard, its feet were like a bear's, and its mouth was like a lions mouth." - Revelation 13:1, 13:2
"Then I saw another beast that rose out of the earth; it had two horns like a lamb and it spoke like a dragon." - Revelation 13:11
^^ Okay, this quote above really interests me because, because it describes what the pagan god, the baphomet, looks like. In case you don't know, the baphomet is a devil, supposedly from another dimension. This picture scares THE LIVING SHIT OUTTA ME; But for educational purposes I'll post it. If I mod wants me to remove it. I WILL GLADY. And be mature about this picture please...
[img]http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:540xEXhq3s9xOM:http://www.illuminati-news.com/graphics/BAPHOMET.JPG&t=1[/img]
"When the thousand years are ended, Satan will be realeased from his prison and will come out to decive the nations at the four corners of the earth" - Revelation 20:7, 20:8
"And the devil who had deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur, where the beast and the false prophet were, and they will be tormented day and night for ever and ever" - Revelation 20:10
"Also, it causes all both small and great, both rich and poor, both free or slave, to be marked on the right hand, and the forehead" - Revelation 13:16
"This calls for wisdom: let anyone with the understanding calculate the number of the beast for it is the number of a person. Its number is six hundred sixty six" - Revelation 13:18
"If you are to be taken captive, into captivity you go, into captivity you go; if you kill with the sword, with the sword you must be killed. Here is a call for the endurance and faith of saints" - Revelation 13:10
Some of this has to do with the false prophet Illuminati theory... what do you guys think?
I'm looking for a mature discussion, not to get flamed, and I'm not looking for idiots.
DICUSS.

item.title: The Bible...? The Illuminati...?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:27, topic:375348”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=471302.msg3448340#msg3448340 date=1293573527]

Illuminati dates back farther than we can actually provide evidence for. Perhaps they created the bible, and thereafter Christianity.

That’s a possibility, but highly unlikely.
[/quote]

There’s a possibility Jesus existed, but highly unlikely.[/quote]

I think Jesus did exsist, but it’s all about personal opinion right?
